attributes.additional_details: Because of the cost of living going up and tax rises and energy bills please give all the NHS staff at least one less thing to worry about by having to make extra money by doing extra long hours to pay for parking at there workplace
attributes.background: Having had to work during the pandemic in unprecedented  pressures please for the loyalty to all the NHS staff make parking free In all hospitals for staff

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
